instruction.en: Short press the "Include" button on the {{driverNameEn}}
instruction.nl: Druk kort op de "Include" knop op de {{driverNameNl}}

instruction.en: Return the device into Setup mode by pressing the "Mode" and "Learn" buttons simultaneously for 3 seconds, then short press the "Learn" button on the {{driverNameEn}}
instruction.nl: Switch het apparaat naar de Setup modus door de "Mode" en "Learn" knoppen tegelijk in te drukken voor 3 seconden, druk daarna kort op de "Learn" knop op de {{driverNameNl}}

hint.en:
Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and every device has 5 nodes to associate.
When the Key Fob is in Scene Mode, pressing the control button, which will send the corresponding Scene id to the associated nodes.
